page.title: 01NEWPORT,EDGMOND & DISTRICT.
page.content: {Newport}is a small{market town }with a {population}of around{8000.}It has a By-Pass taking heavy traffic around it.This was opened in 1984. Several main roads lead from Newport to larger places like Shrewsbury,Wolverhampton and Stafford.It is mainly a residential area and a pleasant place to live.There is a canal,used only for fishing,running through the town.There are several churches and one swimming pool.The outskirts of the town are used for{farming}and{agriculture.} Newport is in Shropshire in the West Midlands.There are many annual{events} held in Newport including the{Newport {Show.}This is the largest one day show in the county.The{Old-Tyme Market}is another{annual event.}Edgmond and Newport have separate{Carnivals}which are also held annually. {
